node.html:
Accelerated product development and helped land a total of $50+ Million in funding in 2024

  • Provide mental health awareness campaigns and workshops to normalize therapy and wellness discussions
  • Shared success stories and testimonials to highlight the positive impact of mental health care
  • Utilized encryption, access controls, and regular audits to protect sensitive user data
  • Leverage ML to analyze user proles and preferences for accurate therapist-patient matching
  • Offer employers clear, data-driven reports showing the impact of mental health programs

Developed the product for OpenStore, enabling them to efciently acquire and manage Shopify-based businesses for entrepreneurs seeking to exit

  • Collaborated with designers, product managers, and engineers to implement new features
  • Implemented role-based access control and the admin panels for each role
  • Improved the application performance through query optimization, caching, and threading
  • Develop APIs and scripts to handle the migration of third-party tools and Shopify plugins
  • Developed models to provide fair and competitive store valuations into diverse e-commerce metrics
  • Build a centralized dashboard to manage inventory, orders, and marketing for all acquired stores
  • Participated in code reviews and design reviews to ensure quality and good architecture

Started as an intern in the product development department, as a result landed seed round funding. Took 2 years to become a junior software developer. In year 4, got elevated to the role of lead developer overseeing a team of 7 developers and designers

  • Provide user guides, customer support, and simple interfaces to help non-technical patients
  • Implement end-to-end encryption, secure login mechanisms, and 2FA to protect patient data
  • Implemented staff management and scheduling feature by integrating Calendly APIs
  • Integrated virtual diagnostic tools and AI-based recommendations to assist physicians
  • Developed APIs and data connectors for compatibility with existing hospital & clinical systems
  • Regularly audit systems to ensure compliance with HIPAA, PHIPA, and other regional regulations
  • Offer multi-device support (web & mobile) with adaptive video quality for users with limited internet access
  • Collaborate with local healthcare providers to ensure test results and records ow seamlessly into the platform
